hadiths.text: Narrated Abdullah ibn Abbas: The Prophet (ﷺ) said about a man who has sexual intercourse with a menstruating woman: He should give one or half dinar as sadaqah

chapter.ara-name: باب فِي كَفَّارَةِ مَنْ أَتَى حَائِضًا
chapter.eng-name: Regarding The Penalty For The One Who Approaches His Wife While She Is Menstruating
